verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
{Bwana Mfalme
ameketi milele (Bwana),
Atawabariki watu wote
kwa amani) x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Atawala Duniani na Mbinguni
Toka mto hata kingo za dunia.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Na wafalme wote
watamwabudia,
mataifa yote yatamtumikia.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Utawala,
utawala wa milele
ni ufalme wenye
kudumu milele.
